titleStmt.title: Two points of great moment, the obligation of humane laws, and the authority of the magistrate about religion, discussed together with the case which gave occasion to the first point : in opposition to the two authors, of the Friendly debate, and of the Preface to a late book of Bishop Bramhalls / by J.H.
titleStmt.author: Humfrey, John, 1621-1719.

titleStmt.title: Two points of great moment, the obligation of humane laws, and the authority of the magistrate about religion, discussed together with the case which gave occasion to the first point : in opposition to the two authors, of the Friendly debate, and of the Preface to a late book of Bishop Bramhalls / by J.H.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Imperfect: film lacks all but the first 15 pages; film also lacks two subsequent title pages: The obligation of human laws discussed, 1671, and The authority of the magistrate about religion, 1672.
